tr_quotes.quote: Güç, cesaret ve iç huzuru geliştirmek zaman alır. Yaptığınız her işlem bu kararın kalbinizde etkili olmasını sağlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Huzur ve adalet aynı bozuk paranın iki tarafıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Dwight Eisenhower

tr_quotes.quote: Yuvarlak bir gezegende yaşarken seçilecek yanlar yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizle barışık olmadığınız sürece, sahip olduğunuzla ilgili asla hoşnut olmayacaksınız.
tr_quotes.author: Doris Mortman

tr_quotes.quote: Her gün bir seçim getirir: Stresi yaşamak ya da huzuru yaşamak.
tr_quotes.author: Joan Borysenko

tr_quotes.quote: Kendisiyle uyum içinde yaşayan kişi, evrenle uyum içinde yaşar.
tr_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyadaki en güzel şeyler görünemez veya dokunulamaz bile. Kalpten hissedilmeleri gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Helen Keller

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat aslında gerçekten basittir, ama biz onu karmaşık hale getirmek için ısrar ederiz.
tr_quotes.author: Confucius

tr_quotes.quote: Huzuru yaşamak arzusundaysanız, başkaları için huzur sağlayın.
tr_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

tr_quotes.quote: Barış, sadece aradığımız uzak bir hedef değil, bu hedefe ulaşmamızda bir araçtır da.
tr_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi içinizde huzuru bulduğunuzda, diğerleriyle huzur içinde yaşayabilen biri haline gelirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

tr_quotes.quote: Aklının, hayatın tüm zorluklarını vücudunun taşıması gerektiğine inandırmasına izin verme.
tr_quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

tr_quotes.quote: Hafiflemek ve özgür olmak için endişe ve kaygılarımı bırakmaya yemin ederim.
tr_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tr_quotes.quote: Rahatlama zamanı ona sahip olmadığın zamandır.
tr_quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk yoğunluk değil, denge, düzen, ritm ve uyum halidir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Merton

tr_quotes.quote: Güzel olmak, kendiniz olmaktır. Başkaları tarafından kabul görmeye ihtiyacınız yoktur. Kendinizi kabul etmelisiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tr_quotes.quote: Huzuru, onun hakkında düşünerek ya da hayal ederek değil, huzursuz aklı susturarak ve rahatlatarak elde edersiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Remez Sasson

tr_quotes.quote: Yavaşlayın, peşinde olduğunuz her şey etrafınıza gelecek ve size yakalayacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: John De Paola

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatımızdaki gölgelerin çoğu kendi güneşimizin önünde durmamızdan kaynaklanır.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Sahip olduğun mutluluğun miktarı, kalbinin içindeki özgürlük miktarına bağlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tr_quotes.quote: Güzel bir istirahat işin yarısıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Barış güçle korunamaz. Sadece anlayışla elde edilebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Kırgın düşüncelerden muaf kişiler kesinlikle huzuru bulur.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Huzur dilediğiniz bir şey değildir. Huzur, oluşturduğunuz bir şeydir, yaptığınız bir şeydir, olduğunuz bir şeydir ve çevrenize yaydığınız bir şeydir.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

tr_quotes.quote: Bin içi boş kelimeden daha iyisi, huzur getiren bir kelimedir.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Sadece küresel seviyede değil, bireysel olarak da, insanlık için en büyük problem, yanlış anlaşılmadır.
tr_quotes.author: Rinpoche

tr_quotes.quote: Gökyüzüne bakarken, bulutlar, ay ve yıldızlar gerçekten kendimi sakin ve umutlu hissettiriyor.
tr_quotes.author: Anne Frank

tr_quotes.quote: Dışarıya kapanmak esasen içeriye açılmaktır. Huzur mu istiyorsun? Az eşya, az insan.
tr_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

tr_quotes.quote: Secdede huzur bulmak varken, ateşin dehşetli kucağına düşmek akıl karı değil.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Huzuru arıyorum. Biliyorum ne yerde ne de gökte. Aslında huzur belki de benim içimde. İhmal ettiğim bir köşede.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kayan yer görünce su gibi akma; Menfaat uğruna dostunu satma; Eğer bu dünyada huzur ararsan; Olur olmaz herkesi dost sanma.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne çok eskimiz var. Tarihi geçmiş ayrılıklar, vadesi dolmuş yalnızlıklar... Eskiciye verilseler, eder mi bir ömür huzur kadar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Huzuru uzaklarda, mutluluğu malda servette, lezzeti ise çok nimette aramak, bulmaktan çok elde olanı da kaybetmeye sebeptir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Vicdanın rahatsa kimin ne dediğinin önemi yok
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyanın en güzel yeri insanın evidir. Yeter ki o evde iman olsun, aşk olsun huzur olsun ve barış olsun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Huzur; her acı sonrası Mevla'ya yönelmek, her sevinç sonrası da şükretmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Boşverdiğin kadar huzurlu, takmadığın kadar mutlusun
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sorunun kendinde olduğunu anlamayan insanlar, çözümü başkalarının huzurunu bozmakta bulur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayırlı eş, huzurun başlangıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Hasetçinin huzuru, çabuk darılanın dostluğu, yalancının ise yiğitliği olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Huzur bulunan yerde, gurbet hasreti çekilmez.
tr_quotes.author: Nurullah Ataç

tr_quotes.quote: Huzur; sevgi ve nefretin ötesindeki alemin adıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Tevfik Fikret

tr_quotes.quote: Yolu doğru olanın yükü ağır olur
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyevi şeylerin huzur vereceğini zannetmek, huzursuzluğun kaynağıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Ali Suad

tr_quotes.quote: Huzurun olduğu yerde soğan bal olur, sevginin olduğu yerde diken gül olur
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sıkıntı ve huzursuzluk mutlaka bir günahın cezası, huzur ise bir ibadetin karşılığıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Huzur istersen, zahmet ile birlikte gelir. Sevinç istersen, kaygı ile birlikte bulunur.
tr_quotes.author: Yusuf Has Hacib

tr_quotes.quote: Dervişe sormuşlar: Huzur nedir? diye. İnandığım yolda, inandığım kişiyle beraber yürümektir, demiş.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Huzur'u başka yerlerde arama, huzur; seccade ile alnın arasında. Git ve deki; Rabbim ben geldim huzuruna...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir evde seccadenin yeri sürekli değişiyorsa o evde ki huzur ve mutluluk hiç bir yerde yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evinde ve ailede huzurlu olmak istiyorsan, eşinin bütün istediklerini yap.
tr_quotes.author: Nijer Özdeyişi

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük mutlaka paylaşılacak; suç ortağı bir sevgiliyle...
tr_quotes.author: Attila İlhan

tr_quotes.quote: Ve senin yanında öylesine huzurlu, öylesine huzursuz; öylesine baskı altında ve öylesine özgürüm ki...
tr_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

tr_quotes.quote: Sana olan aşkım benden bile büyük, o içimde değil ben onun içinde yaşıyorum...
tr_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

tr_quotes.quote: Aynı duyguyu paylaşan kederli ruhlar birbirleriyle karşılaştıklarında huzur bulurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Halil Cibran

tr_quotes.quote: Sesindeki huzuru kimse bilmesin, kıskanırım.
tr_quotes.author: Edip Cansever

en_quotes.quote: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace
en_quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

en_quotes.quote: Without peace, all other dreams vanish and are reduced to ashes
en_quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

en_quotes.quote: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love
en_quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

en_quotes.quote: To survive in peace and harmony, united and strong, we must have one people, one nation, one flag
en_quotes.author: Pauline Hanson

en_quotes.quote: Every breath we take, every step we make, can be filled with peace, joy and serenity
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: Carrying yourself with poise and joy and peace within - that's sexy
en_quotes.author: Leah LaBelle

en_quotes.quote: While you are proclaiming peace with your lips, be careful to have it even more fully in your heart
en_quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

en_quotes.quote: Without resolving Kashmir dispute, lasting peace cannot be maintained in the region
en_quotes.author: Shehbaz Sharif

en_quotes.quote: We are all on a journey to mastering our inner peace
en_quotes.author: Raheem DeVaughn

en_quotes.quote: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: I believe that through knowledge and discipline, financial peace is possible for all of us
en_quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

en_quotes.quote: Do not overrate what you have received, nor envy others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: I'm at peace with what I'm doing, I feel good with what I wake up doing and about my lifestyle
en_quotes.author: Nipsey Hussle

en_quotes.quote: When you've seen beyond yourself, then you may find, peace of mind is waiting there
en_quotes.author: George Harrison

en_quotes.quote: To insure peace of mind ignore the rules and regulations
en_quotes.author: George Ade

en_quotes.quote: I was always at peace because of the way my mom treated me
en_quotes.author: Martina Hingis

en_quotes.quote: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: We've climbed the mighty mountain. I see the valley below, and it's a valley of peace
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: When we have done our best, we should wait the result in peace
en_quotes.author: John Lubbock

en_quotes.quote: Cross the meadow and the stream and listen as the peaceful water brings peace upon your soul
en_quotes.author: Maximillian Degenerez

en_quotes.quote: I just want to find some inner peace, and I think I'm getting there, slowly but surely
en_quotes.author: Toni Collette

en_quotes.quote: We believe in peace and peaceful development, not only for ourselves but for people all over the world
en_quotes.author: Lal Bahadur Shastri

en_quotes.quote: Those who want peace should prepare for war and be strong
en_quotes.author: Avigdor Lieberman

en_quotes.quote: I like fishing. Not actual fishing - I like the peace and quiet of being at sea. It's different
en_quotes.author: Rafael Nadal

en_quotes.quote: We must fight for peace bravely as we fought in war
en_quotes.author: Lal Bahadur Shastri

en_quotes.quote: People of Pakistan want only development, prosperity, and peace
en_quotes.author: Shehbaz Sharif

en_quotes.quote: Obsessed by a fairy tale, we spend our lives searching for a magic door and a lost kingdom of peace
en_quotes.author: Eugene O'Neill

en_quotes.quote: I'm still a soldier, fighting with my pen and paper for peace till the day I cease
en_quotes.author: Emmanuel Jal

en_quotes.quote: Islam teaches tolerance, not hatred; universal brotherhood, not enmity; peace, and not violence
en_quotes.author: Pervez Musharraf

en_quotes.quote: We shall find peace. We shall hear angels, we shall see the sky sparkling with diamonds
en_quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

en_quotes.quote: The more you sweat in peace, the less you bleed in war
en_quotes.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

en_quotes.quote: My faith helps me understand that circumstances don't dictate my happiness, my inner peace
en_quotes.author: Denzel Washington

en_quotes.quote: The meaning of peace is the absence of opposition to socialism
en_quotes.author: Karl Marx

en_quotes.quote: Terrorism is a significant threat to peace and security, prosperity and people
en_quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

en_quotes.quote: Be at peace with your own soul, then heaven and earth will be at peace with you
en_quotes.author: Isaac of Nineveh

en_quotes.quote: A musician must make music, an artist must paint, a poet must write, if he is to be ultimately at peace with himself
en_quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

en_quotes.quote: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: Other people do not have to change for us to experience peace of mind
en_quotes.author: Gerald Jampolsky

en_quotes.quote: Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: Negative emotions like hatred destroy our peace of mind
en_quotes.author: Matthieu Ricard

en_quotes.quote: Mother's love is peace. It need not be acquired, it need not be deserved
en_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

en_quotes.quote: Here men from the planet Earth first set foot upon the Moon. July 1969 AD. We came in peace for all mankind
en_quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: Pursue some path, however narrow and crooked, in which you can walk with love and reverence
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Each one has to find his peace from within. And peace to be real must be unaffected by outside circumstances
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Peace, unity, love, and nonviolence should be our rallying cry and the catalyst for change in our nation
en_quotes.author: Tony Evans

en_quotes.quote: The great thing in the world is not so much to seek happiness as to earn peace and self-respect
en_quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

en_quotes.quote: God cannot give us a happiness and peace apart from Himself, because it is not there. There is no such thing
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: Peace and justice are two sides of the same coin
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: Peace has its victories no less than war, but it doesn't have as many monuments to unveil
en_quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: You have to understand that people have to pay a price for peace. If you dare to struggle, you dare to win
en_quotes.author: Fred Hampton

en_quotes.quote: There are no military solutions - dialogue and diplomacy are the only guarantee of lasting peace
en_quotes.author: Martin McGuinness

en_quotes.quote: The game is my wife. It demands loyalty and responsibility, and it gives me back fulfillment and peace
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: Barbecue may not be the road to world peace, but it's a start
en_quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

en_quotes.quote: An army of principles can penetrate where an army of soldiers cannot
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: Humanitarian response, sustainable development, and sustaining peace are three sides of the same triangle
en_quotes.author: Antonio Guterres

en_quotes.quote: I have never advocated war except as a means of peace
en_quotes.author: Ulysses S. Grant

en_quotes.quote: I can have peace of mind only when I forgive rather than judge
en_quotes.author: Gerald Jampolsky

en_quotes.quote: Nonviolence is the first article of my faith. It is also the last article of my creed
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Nowhere can man find a quieter or more untroubled retreat than in his own soul
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: He belonged to that army known as invincible in peace, invisible in war
en_quotes.author: William Tecumseh Sherman

en_quotes.quote: A crust eaten in peace is better than a banquet partaken in anxiety
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: I'm just hoping that people understand that Islam is peace and not violence
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

en_quotes.quote: I believe it is peace in our time
en_quotes.author: Neville Chamberlain

en_quotes.quote: Peace goes into the making of a poem as flour goes into the making of bread
en_quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

en_quotes.quote: Our peace shall stand as firm as rocky mountains
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: A peace is of the nature of a conquest; for then both parties nobly are subdued, and neither party loser
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: The Dove, on silver pinions, winged her peaceful way
en_quotes.author: James Montgomery

en_quotes.quote: Courageous people do not fear forgiving, for the sake of peace
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: My dream is to live a good life and be loving, be close to God and be a good human being and bring peace to people
en_quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

en_quotes.quote: I do not want the peace which passeth understanding, I want the understanding which bringeth peace
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: To be prepared for war is one of the most effective means of preserving peace
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: One can not reflect in streaming water. Only those who know internal peace can give it to others
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: You'll never find peace of mind until you listen to your heart
en_quotes.author: George Michael

en_quotes.quote: Those who make peaceful revolution impossible will make violent revolution inevitable
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: We make war that we may live in peace
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: To spread love, healing, peace, and joy is my mission in life - and so I speak up
en_quotes.author: India Arie

en_quotes.quote: Never, for the sake of peace and quiet, deny your own experience or convictions
en_quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

en_quotes.quote: Be at war with your vices, at peace with your neighbors, and let every new year find you a better man
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: I've made peace with the fact that the things that I thought were weaknesses or flaws were just me. I like them
en_quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

en_quotes.quote: Peace demands the united efforts of us all. Who can foresee what spark might ignite the fuse?
en_quotes.author: Haile Selassie

en_quotes.quote: Wars are, of course, as a rule to be avoided; but they are far better than certain kinds of peace
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: The purpose of all wars, is peace
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: Complete peace equally reigns between two mental waves
en_quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

en_quotes.quote: Until he extends his circle of compassion to include all living things, man will not himself find peace
en_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

en_quotes.quote: I like having peace and quiet in my life, and I am perfectly happy in my relationships
en_quotes.author: Loni Love

en_quotes.quote: What we need is Star Peace and not Star Wars
en_quotes.author: Mikhail Gorbachev

en_quotes.quote: But my happiness in this world - my level of peace - is never going to be dictated by acting
en_quotes.author: Chris Evans

en_quotes.quote: As an artist I come to sing, but as a citizen, I will always speak for peace, and no one can silence me in this
en_quotes.author: Paul Robeson

en_quotes.quote: You may call for peace as loudly as you wish, but where there is no brotherhood there can in the end be no peace
en_quotes.author: Max Lerner

en_quotes.quote: I have inner peace; I have accomplished a great deal
en_quotes.author: Neil Sedaka

en_quotes.quote: Establishing lasting peace is the work of education; all politics can do is keep us out of war
en_quotes.author: Maria Montessori

en_quotes.quote: I prefer peace. But if trouble must come, let it come in my time, so that my children can live in peace
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: I love Miami; I miss it so much. I miss the beach, the peace it brings you. I love the sound and smell of the sea
en_quotes.author: Genesis Rodriguez

en_quotes.quote: I would like to see real peace and a state of Israel living peacefully alongside a state of Palestine
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: If you want to make peace, you don't talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies
en_quotes.author: Moshe Dayan

en_quotes.quote: Every time I'm in Georgia, I eat a peach for peace
en_quotes.author: Duane Allman

en_quotes.quote: You can have peace. Or you can have freedom. Don't ever count on having both at once
en_quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

en_quotes.quote: To secure peace is to prepare for war
en_quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

en_quotes.quote: The man who has gotten everything he wants is all in favor of peace and order
en_quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

en_quotes.quote: I'm at peace with myself. The main thing is not letting people dictate what I do or what I am
en_quotes.author: Magic Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I believe that eyes are very important motifs. That's something that can discern the peace and love
en_quotes.author: Yayoi Kusama

en_quotes.quote: I believe that democracy is the best guarantor for peace and cooperation among nations
en_quotes.author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

en_quotes.quote: Peace, unity and harmony!
en_quotes.author: Cathy Freeman

en_quotes.quote: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist
en_quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Nothing has brought me more love, joy and peace than being a good husband and good daddy
en_quotes.author: Frank Abagnale

en_quotes.quote: Harmony makes small things grow, lack of it makes great things decay
en_quotes.author: Sallust

en_quotes.quote: Instead of a man of peace and love, I have become a man of violence and revenge
en_quotes.author: Hiawatha

en_quotes.quote: Smoke the pipe of peace, bury the tomahawk, and become one nation
en_quotes.author: Zebulon Pike

en_quotes.quote: It is madness for sheep to talk peace with a wolf
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: War makes thieves and peace hangs them
en_quotes.author: George Herbert

en_quotes.quote: The practice of peace and reconciliation is one of the most vital and artistic of human actions
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: Peace of mind for five minutes, that's what I crave
en_quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

en_quotes.quote: The way to preserve the peace of the church is to preserve its purity
en_quotes.author: Matthew Henry

en_quotes.quote: The quiet rhythmic monotone of the wall of logs fills one with the rustic peace of a secluded nook in the woods
en_quotes.author: Gustav Stickley

en_quotes.quote: Today, I am blessed to be living a dream. And yet, if it all went away tomorrow, I know I would still have peace
en_quotes.author: Tim Howard

en_quotes.quote: The lesson of the Cold War is that against nuclear weapons, only nuclear weapons can hold the peace
en_quotes.author: Chung Mong-joon

en_quotes.quote: I hope royalty continues forever. This is the thing that can contribute to peace throughout the world
en_quotes.author: Yayoi Kusama

en_quotes.quote: Where ignorance is our master, there is no possibility of real peace
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: Peace, commerce and honest friendship with all nations; entangling alliances with none
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: We will not waver; we will not tire; we will not falter, and we will not fail. Peace and Freedom will prevail
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: Intervention only works when the people concerned seem to be keen for peace
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: When you make your peace with authority, you become authority
en_quotes.author: Jim Morrison

en_quotes.quote: The pursuit, even of the best things, ought to be calm and tranquil
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: If you want peace, you don't talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies
en_quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

en_quotes.quote: Communism is a hateful thing, and a menace to peace and organized government
en_quotes.author: Grover Cleveland

en_quotes.quote: America should know that peace with Iran is the mother of all peace, and war with Iran is the mother of all wars
en_quotes.author: Hassan Rouhani

en_quotes.quote: One thing you get from me is peace, love, and positivity
en_quotes.author: Logic

en_quotes.quote: There can never be peace between nations until there is first known that true peace which is within the souls of men
en_quotes.author: Black Elk

en_quotes.quote: Choosing an attitude of faith will release peace out of your spirit and into your soul
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: I have traveled a long road from the battlefield to the peace table
en_quotes.author: Moshe Dayan

en_quotes.quote: The government I led gave ordinary people peace, security, dignity, and opportunity to progress
en_quotes.author: Benazir Bhutto

en_quotes.quote: Fishing gives me peace, tranquillity. And also, as a forward player, it helps me with my eyes
en_quotes.author: Edinson Cavani

en_quotes.quote: Every human longs for peace and love
en_quotes.author: Hiawatha

en_quotes.quote: If you want to be a voice for peace in the world, begin by making peace a permanent condition of your own life
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: Revenge only engenders violence, not clarity and true peace. I think liberation must come from within
en_quotes.author: Sandra Cisneros

en_quotes.quote: Not one of us can rest, be happy, be at home, be at peace with ourselves, until we end hatred and division
en_quotes.author: John Lewis

en_quotes.quote: The hippies wanted peace and love. We wanted Ferraris, blondes and switchblades
en_quotes.author: Alice Cooper

en_quotes.quote: Peace is not made at the council table or by treaties, but in the hearts of men
en_quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

en_quotes.quote: Islam means peace
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: You may either win your peace or buy it: win it, by resistance to evil; buy it, by compromise with evil
en_quotes.author: John Ruskin

en_quotes.quote: People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: War will never cease until babies begin to come into the world with larger cerebrums and smaller adrenal glands
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: Take a moment every day to find peace. Pull over to the side of the road, turn off the radio, and find peace
en_quotes.author: Richard Simmons

en_quotes.quote: I like my peace and quiet whenever I can grab it
en_quotes.author: Wole Soyinka

en_quotes.quote: Peace of mind comes from not wanting to change others
en_quotes.author: Gerald Jampolsky

en_quotes.quote: I just want you to know that, when we talk about war, we're really talking about peace
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: My heritage has been my grounding, and it has brought me peace
en_quotes.author: Maureen O'Hara

en_quotes.quote: God bless Africa, Guard her people, Guide her leaders, And give her peace
en_quotes.author: Trevor Huddleston

en_quotes.quote: The services in wartime are fit only for desperadoes, but in peace are only fit for fools
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: No one can find inner peace except by working, not in a self- centered way, but for the whole human family
en_quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is more precious than peace, by which all war, both in Heaven and Earth, is brought to an end
en_quotes.author: Ignatius of Antioch

en_quotes.quote: Peace is not a thought, not a concept; it is a nonverbal experience
en_quotes.author: Henepola Gunaratana

en_quotes.quote: But I do like to have peace and quiet for a good hour
en_quotes.author: Bryan Ferry

en_quotes.quote: Defending peace is the duty of all
en_quotes.author: Fidel Castro

en_quotes.quote: I am very much about peace. There is so much turmoil in this world
en_quotes.author: Michelle Visage

en_quotes.quote: For Pleasure, Delight, Peace and Felicity live in method and temperance
en_quotes.author: Margaret Cavendish

en_quotes.quote: When at home, I pray to all forms of Goddess Durga for health, wealth, peace, and prosperity for me and my family
en_quotes.author: Roop Durgapal

en_quotes.quote: The opposite of war is not peace, it's creation
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Larson

en_quotes.quote: Vegetarianism is a link to perfection and peace
en_quotes.author: River Phoenix

en_quotes.quote: None of the abstract concepts comes closer to fulfilled utopia than that of eternal peace
en_quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

en_quotes.quote: In the whole round of human affairs little is so fatal to peace as misunderstanding
en_quotes.author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster

en_quotes.quote: I have won many trophies in my time, but nothing will ever top helping win the battle for peace in my country
en_quotes.author: Didier Drogba

en_quotes.quote: Freedom of expression comes with responsibilities, especially when it comes with serious implications for peace
en_quotes.author: Mohammed Morsi

en_quotes.quote: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: There cannot be peace in the Middle East without giving Palestinians their full rights
en_quotes.author: Mohammed Morsi

en_quotes.quote: Nobody can bring you peace but yourself
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: The real and lasting victories are those of peace, and not of war
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Avoid popularity if you would have peace
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Peace is its own reward
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: I dream of an Africa which is in peace with itself
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: Peace is not merely a distant goal that we seek, but a means by which we arrive at that goal
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: It is not enough to say we must not wage war. It is necessary to love peace and sacrifice for it
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Piety is not a goal but a means to attain through the purest peace of mind the highest culture
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Even peace may be purchased at too high a price
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: We must concentrate not merely on the negative expulsion of war but the postive affirmation of peace
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: I declare that I will establish peace in this world
en_quotes.author: Prem Rawat

en_quotes.quote: Peace and friendship with all mankind is our wisest policy, and I wish we may be permitted to pursue it
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: There was never a good war, or a bad peace
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: The chief duty of government is to keep the peace and stand out of the sunshine of the people
en_quotes.author: James A. Garfield

en_quotes.quote: There is peace more destructive of the manhood of living man than war is destructive of his material body
en_quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

en_quotes.quote: We will not have peace by afterthought
en_quotes.author: Norman Cousins

en_quotes.quote: He that would live in peace and at ease must not speak all he knows or all he sees
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: If they want peace, nations should avoid the pin-pricks that precede cannon shots
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: I've made peace with insecurity... because there is no security of any kind
en_quotes.author: Dick Van Dyke

en_quotes.quote: I believe in peace. Only peaceful co-existence can ensure peace
en_quotes.author: Sheikh Hasina

en_quotes.quote: So long as there is imperialism in the world, a permanent peace is impossible
en_quotes.author: Hassan Nasrallah

en_quotes.quote: Be good, keep your feet dry, your eyes open, your heart at peace and your soul in the joy of Christ
en_quotes.author: Thomas Merton

en_quotes.quote: God is day and night, winter and summer, war and peace, surfeit and hunger
en_quotes.author: Heraclitus

en_quotes.quote: Peace secured by slavish submission is not peace
en_quotes.author: Kim Il-sung

en_quotes.quote: Wars begin in the minds of men, and in those minds, love and compassion would have built the defenses of peace
en_quotes.author: U Thant

en_quotes.quote: They may call me a sinner, but I am at peace with myself
en_quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

en_quotes.quote: Peace is not only better than war, but infinitely more arduous
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: A people free to choose will always choose peace
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: I think when you exercise in open spaces, it kind of detoxifies your body and gives you peace of mind
en_quotes.author: Nushrat Bharucha

en_quotes.quote: There's so much chaos and trouble in the world right now, and we need to broadcast as much peace and love, too
en_quotes.author: Jim James

en_quotes.quote: Peace is a journey of a thousand miles and it must be taken one step at a time
en_quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Give a child love, laughter and peace, not AIDS
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: It is an unfortunate fact that we can secure peace only by preparing for war
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Nuclear disarmament and non-proliferation are not utopian ideals. They are critical to global peace and security
en_quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

en_quotes.quote: The choice, however, is as clear now for nations as it was once for the individual: peace or extinction
en_quotes.author: Lester B. Pearson

en_quotes.quote: The European Union is the world's most successful invention for advancing peace
en_quotes.author: John Bruton

en_quotes.quote: When you can whip any man in the world, you never know peace
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

en_quotes.quote: Secure property in hand leads to peace in mind
en_quotes.author: Mencius

en_quotes.quote: The world must be made safe for democracy. Its peace must be planted upon the tested foundations of political liberty
en_quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Broad-mindedness is related to tolerance; open-mindedness is the sibling of peace
en_quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

en_quotes.quote: The grim fact is that we prepare for war like precocious giants, and for peace like retarded pygmies
en_quotes.author: Lester B. Pearson

en_quotes.quote: I hope peace is a part of everyday life
en_quotes.author: Moon Jae-in

en_quotes.quote: We are going to have peace even if we have to fight for it
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: On all the peaks lies peace
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Operation Peace for Galilee is not a military operation resulting from the lack of an alternative
en_quotes.author: Menachem Begin

en_quotes.quote: When your higher self is present, it always promotes peace
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: True humility is contentment
en_quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

en_quotes.quote: A conqueror is always a lover of peace
en_quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

en_quotes.quote: Care less for your harvest than for how it is shared and your life will have meaning and your heart will have peace
en_quotes.author: Kent Nerburn

en_quotes.quote: Mankind must remember that peace is not God's gift to his creatures; peace is our gift to each other
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: I think the perception of peace is what distracts most people from really having it
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: We do not want riches, we want peace and love
en_quotes.author: Red Cloud

en_quotes.quote: You do have a modicum of peace of mind here, but it's as unsettled as any other place
en_quotes.author: Todd Rundgren

en_quotes.quote: If you cannot find peace within yourself, you will never find it anywhere else
en_quotes.author: Marvin Gaye

en_quotes.quote: Hold me in your arms, lava lamp! Let me seek magma comfort and peace in the warmth of your kryptonite embrace
en_quotes.author: Isabel Yosito

en_quotes.quote: Peace does not mean just to stop wars, but also to stop oppression and injustice
en_quotes.author: Tawakkol Karman

en_quotes.quote: I'm more relaxed and just feel like there's kind of a peace with myself
en_quotes.author: Katie Hoff

en_quotes.quote: Let us have peace
en_quotes.author: Ulysses S. Grant

en_quotes.quote: Never for the sake of peace and quiet deny your convictions
en_quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

en_quotes.quote: We want a full peace, normalization in all fields
en_quotes.author: Menachem Begin

en_quotes.quote: In peace, sons bury their fathers. In war, fathers bury their sons
en_quotes.author: Herodotus

en_quotes.quote: I would rather have peace in the world than be President
en_quotes.author: Harry S Truman

en_quotes.quote: Peace is liberty in tranquillity
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: We must join with the tens of millions all over the world who see in peace our most sacred responsibility
en_quotes.author: Paul Robeson

en_quotes.quote: When you find peace within yourself, you become the kind of person who can live at peace with others
en_quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

en_quotes.quote: There are no absolute rules of conduct, either in peace or war. Everything depends on circumstances
en_quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

en_quotes.quote: Peace is our gift to each other
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: Peace is one of the most precious gifts God has promised His children
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Take away the violence and who will hear the men of peace?
en_quotes.author: Lorraine Hansberry

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is more conducive to peace of mind than not having any opinion at all
en_quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

en_quotes.quote: You don't make peace with friends. You make it with very unsavory enemies
en_quotes.author: Yitzhak Rabin

en_quotes.quote: There is no way to peace; peace is the way
en_quotes.author: A. J. Muste

en_quotes.quote: We seek peace, knowing that peace is the climate of freedom
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: When life doesn't make sense, we can still have peace
en_quotes.author: Rick Warren

en_quotes.quote: Let us not deceive ourselves; we must elect world peace or world destruction
en_quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

en_quotes.quote: We will not learn how to live together in peace by killing each other's children
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

en_quotes.quote: An unjust peace is better than a just war
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: The only excuse for war is that we may live in peace unharmed
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: You can find peace amidst the storms that threaten you
en_quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

en_quotes.quote: An angry generation will not bring peace to the world; I do believe that
en_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

en_quotes.quote: Yes, peace can and must be won, to save the world from the terrible destruction of World War III
en_quotes.author: Paul Robeson

en_quotes.quote: In many ways, when you're a Nobel peace laureate, you have an obligation to humankind, to society
en_quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

en_quotes.quote: This is the way of peace: Overcome evil with good, falsehood with truth, and hatred with love
en_quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

en_quotes.quote: I think that peace will require two states, a Palestinian state that recognizes the Jewish state
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Netanyahu

en_quotes.quote: Let me just say: Peace to you, if you're willing to fight for it
en_quotes.author: Fred Hampton

en_quotes.quote: To achieve a lasting peace in the Middle East takes guts, not guns
en_quotes.author: Queen Rania of Jordan

en_quotes.quote: I cannot imagine any writer who would not fight for his peace and quiet
en_quotes.author: Wislawa Szymborska

en_quotes.quote: If anything I consider myself non-violent, I'm from the hippy era, peace, love, groovy
en_quotes.author: Rick James

en_quotes.quote: I never will have peace of mind. I'm not constructed that way. Some things in life can be horrible
en_quotes.author: Julie Christie

en_quotes.quote: Migratory birds connect people, ecosystems, and nations. They are symbols of peace and of an interconnected planet
en_quotes.author: Antonio Guterres

en_quotes.quote: We must fight terrorism as if there's no peace process and work to achieve peace as if there's no terror
en_quotes.author: Yitzhak Rabin

en_quotes.quote: I may not lead the most dramatic life, but in my brain it's 'War and Peace' everyday
en_quotes.author: Rufus Wainwright

en_quotes.quote: If I was a super hero, I'd want to be the man of peace so that I could click my fingers and the world would be at peace
en_quotes.author: Lee Ryan

en_quotes.quote: The Japanese chose the principle of eternal peace as the basis of morality for our rebirth after the War
en_quotes.author: Kenzaburo Oe

en_quotes.quote: Never underestimate or mock peace
en_quotes.author: Boris Trajkovski

en_quotes.quote: I believe in peace. I believe in mercy
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: Peace is a natural effect of trade
en_quotes.author: Montesquieu

en_quotes.quote: Loud peace propaganda makes war seem imminent
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: You either get tired fighting for peace, or you die
en_quotes.author: John Lennon

en_quotes.quote: Peace hath higher tests of manhood, than battle ever knew
en_quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

en_quotes.quote: In addition to serving overseas, the Peace Corps' Crisis Corps Volunteers have helped their fellow Americans
en_quotes.author: Solomon Ortiz

en_quotes.quote: After four years at the United Nations I sometimes yearn for the peace and tranquility of a political convention
en_quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson I

en_quotes.quote: Civil strife is as much a greater evil than a concerted war effort as war itself is worse than peace
en_quotes.author: Herodotus

en_quotes.quote: The more bombers, the less room for doves of peace
en_quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

en_quotes.quote: I do know that some Buddhists are able to attain peace of mind
en_quotes.author: Martin Scorsese

en_quotes.quote: Peace is the virtue of civilization. War is its crime
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: I took a speed-reading course and read War and Peace in twenty minutes. It involves Russia
en_quotes.author: Woody Allen

en_quotes.quote: I am at peace with God. My conflict is with Man
en_quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

en_quotes.quote: My different personalities leave me in peace now
en_quotes.author: Anna Freud

en_quotes.quote: To me, it's that incredible sense of belonging and peace within your own self and heart that really is joy
en_quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

en_quotes.quote: Hope is like peace. It is not a gift from God. It is a gift only we can give one another
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: In order to establish peace, you must have fair justice for everyone
en_quotes.author: Al Sharpton

en_quotes.quote: May our former president, who brought peace to millions, find it for himself
en_quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

en_quotes.quote: I love Ireland. I feel very at peace there. It's just magical and beautiful
en_quotes.author: Eva Green

en_quotes.quote: Hospice is such a tremendous thing. Patients seem to reach an inner peace
en_quotes.author: Harmon Killebrew

en_quotes.quote: I feel like I play better when I'm calm. There is an inner peace I can tap into sometimes during my matches
en_quotes.author: Naomi Osaka

en_quotes.quote: War should never be entered upon until every agency of peace has failed
en_quotes.author: William McKinley

en_quotes.quote: Peace is necessary. For justice, it is necessary. For hope, it is necessary, for our future
en_quotes.author: Harry Belafonte

en_quotes.quote: Democracy is necessary to peace and to undermining the forces of terrorism
en_quotes.author: Benazir Bhutto

en_quotes.quote: I must end it. There is no hope. I will be at peace. No one had anything to do with it. My decision totally
en_quotes.author: Freddie Prinze

en_quotes.quote: To my knowledge, no one has died from a cyberattack... but there is a gray area between peace and war
en_quotes.author: Valerie Plame

en_quotes.quote: When playing music, it is possible to achieve a unique sense of peace
en_quotes.author: Daniel Barenboim

en_quotes.quote: Peace cannot come from punishing the Palestinian people
en_quotes.author: Nick Rahall

en_quotes.quote: I will do whatever it takes to help settle peace on the Korean Peninsula
en_quotes.author: Moon Jae-in

en_quotes.quote: You don't have to have fought in a war to love peace
en_quotes.author: Geraldine Ferraro

en_quotes.quote: My passion stems from seeking world peace and finding how we can live together creatively rather than violently
en_quotes.author: Mimi Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Love has its place, as does hate. Peace has its place, as does war. Mercy has its place, as do cruelty and revenge
en_quotes.author: Meir Kahane

en_quotes.quote: Social justice is the surest guarantor of peace in the world
en_quotes.author: Guy Ryder

en_quotes.quote: Peace, so elusive in the past many decades, now finally prevails all over the country
en_quotes.author: Hun Sen

en_quotes.quote: Every night, whisper 'peace' in your husband's ear
en_quotes.author: Andrei A. Gromyko

en_quotes.quote: Without peace, there is nothing truly human. Peace is harmony. And harmony is the highest ideal of life
en_quotes.author: Klas Pontus Arnoldson

en_quotes.quote: If we have not peace within ourselves, it is in vain to seek it from outward sources
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: People always make war when they say they love peace
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: We know that dictators are quick to choose aggression, while free nations strive to resolve differences in peace
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: Peace is not an absence of war, it is a virtue, a state of mind, a disposition for benevolence, confidence, justice
en_quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

en_quotes.quote: If you use weapons of war to bring about peace, you're going to have more war and destruction
en_quotes.author: Coretta Scott King

en_quotes.quote: While we yearn for peace, we live in a world burdened with hunger, pain, anguish, loneliness, sickness, and sorrow
en_quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

en_quotes.quote: The universe is conspiring in every moment to bring me happiness and peace
en_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

en_quotes.quote: My argument is that War makes rattling good history; but Peace is poor reading
en_quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

en_quotes.quote: He who follows his lessons tastes a profound peace, and looks upon everybody as a bunch of manure
en_quotes.author: Moliere

en_quotes.quote: To injure an opponent is to injure yourself. To control aggression without inflicting injury is the Art of Peace
en_quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

en_quotes.quote: Power to the peaceful!
en_quotes.author: Michael Franti

en_quotes.quote: Nothing in the world can take my peace away from me
en_quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

en_quotes.quote: Children are God's Apostles, sent forth, day by day, to preach of love, and hope, and peace
en_quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

en_quotes.quote: If you want peace work for justice
en_quotes.author: Pope Paul VI

en_quotes.quote: You have to make peace with yourself. The key is to find the harmony in what you have
en_quotes.author: Naomi Watts

en_quotes.quote: I'm at peace with myself because what I talk about is the way I live
en_quotes.author: Sean Hannity

en_quotes.quote: God has blessed me. I've been given a lot. I'm at peace with myself. It's time to give back
en_quotes.author: Michael K. Williams

en_quotes.quote: As I came to power peacefully, so shall I keep it
en_quotes.author: Corazon Aquino

en_quotes.quote: Ignorance is a menace to peace
en_quotes.author: Paul P. Harris

en_quotes.quote: Whoever wishes peace among peoples must fight statism
en_quotes.author: Ludwig von Mises

en_quotes.quote: We leave as we came and, god willing, as we shall return, with peace, and hope for all mankind
en_quotes.author: Gene Cernan

en_quotes.quote: Any negotiation on the basis of land for peace is a fatal mistake
en_quotes.author: Avigdor Lieberman

en_quotes.quote: A quiet mind cureth all
en_quotes.author: Robert Burton

en_quotes.quote: We love peace, but not peace at any price
en_quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

en_quotes.quote: I think it's naive to pray for world peace if we're not going to change the form in which we live
en_quotes.author: Godfrey Reggio

en_quotes.quote: It is far easier to make war than peace
en_quotes.author: Georges Clemenceau

en_quotes.quote: We must all make peace so that we can all live in peace
en_quotes.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

en_quotes.quote: Palestine is the issue, and until this issue is resolved, there can be no peace
en_quotes.author: Hamza Yusuf

en_quotes.quote: Blessed be God that Thou hast filled the soul of Thy servant with joy and peace in believing
en_quotes.author: Christopher Love

en_quotes.quote: Peace is when time doesn't matter as it passes by
en_quotes.author: Maria Schell

en_quotes.quote: I'm happy and at peace with where I am at life
en_quotes.author: Rebecca Lobo

en_quotes.quote: Now God be praised, I will die in peace
en_quotes.author: James Wolfe

en_quotes.quote: Peace in Palestine is inevitable. The question is how do we make it happen today
en_quotes.author: Darrell Issa

en_quotes.quote: We believe world peace is inevitable
en_quotes.author: Anne Perry

en_quotes.quote: Without peace, there is no freedom, individual or national. War and hostilities are a form of slavery
en_quotes.author: Klas Pontus Arnoldson

en_quotes.quote: My constant prayer, my number one foreign goal, is to bring peace to Israel. And in the process to Israel's neighbours
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

en_quotes.quote: I know I had no hand in making this war, and I know I will make more sacrifices today than any of you to secure peace
en_quotes.author: William Tecumseh Sherman

en_quotes.quote: A bad peace is even worse than war
en_quotes.author: Tacitus

en_quotes.quote: Peace is rarely denied to the peaceful
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: If there is to be any peace it will come through being, not having
en_quotes.author: Henry Miller

en_quotes.quote: Those who are at war with others are not at peace with themselves
en_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

en_quotes.quote: First keep peace with yourself, then you can also bring peace to others
en_quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

en_quotes.quote: I took a deep breath and listened to the old bray of my heart. I am. I am. I am
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

en_quotes.quote: I'm all about peace. I'm all about unity. I'm all about love
en_quotes.author: DJ Khaled

en_quotes.quote: Peace is produced by war
en_quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

en_quotes.quote: For me, peace should provide security to the Jewish people
en_quotes.author: Ariel Sharon

en_quotes.quote: There is always a certain peace in being what one is, in being that completely
en_quotes.author: Ugo Betti

en_quotes.quote: One is called to live nonviolently, even if the change one works for seems impossible
en_quotes.author: Daniel Berrigan

en_quotes.quote: Good wishes alone will not ensure peace
en_quotes.author: Alfred Nobel

en_quotes.quote: The attainment of the economic aims of man presupposes peace
en_quotes.author: Ludwig von Mises

en_quotes.quote: Peace is a conscious choice
en_quotes.author: John Denver

en_quotes.quote: Peace has to be created, in order to be maintained. It will never be achieved by passivity and quietism
en_quotes.author: Dorothy Thompson

en_quotes.quote: Usually, all I want is peace and quiet when I'm driving home
en_quotes.author: Mack Wilberg

en_quotes.quote: Yes, we love peace, but we are not willing to take wounds for it, as we are for war
en_quotes.author: John Holmes

en_quotes.quote: Of one thing I am certain, the body is not the measure of healing, peace is the measure
en_quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

en_quotes.quote: I don't know whether war is an interlude during peace, or peace an interlude during war
en_quotes.author: Georges Clemenceau

en_quotes.quote: I won't undertake war until I have tried all the arts and means of peace
en_quotes.author: Francois Rabelais

en_quotes.quote: Peace is more than simply the absence of war; it is the absence of conditions that give rise to war
en_quotes.author: Ron Dellums

en_quotes.quote: We want to take good tidings home to our people, that they may sleep in peace
en_quotes.author: Black Kettle

en_quotes.quote: The quest for peace begins in the home, in the school and in the workplace
en_quotes.author: Silvia Cartwright

en_quotes.quote: Peace, love, and truth trump hate every time
en_quotes.author: Peter Frampton

en_quotes.quote: The business of peace requires more than showing up with paint brushes, foodstuffs and an oil pipeline or two
en_quotes.author: Tony Snow

en_quotes.quote: The object of government in peace and in war is not the glory of rulers or of races, but the happiness of common man
en_quotes.author: William Beveridge

en_quotes.quote: We've got to win this battle, and we will. We have to win the peace
en_quotes.author: Al D'Amato

en_quotes.quote: Peace is the first thing the angels sang
en_quotes.author: John Keble

en_quotes.quote: I happen to dig being able to use whatever mystique I have to further the idea of peace
en_quotes.author: Garrett Morris
